yanwittmann.file

Class FileUtils

  • java.lang.Object
    • yanwittmann.file.FileUtils

  • public abstract class FileUtils
extends java.lang.Object
    A wide variety of functions related to reading, writing and watching files.
    Use setDisplayExceptions(boolean) to decide whether the exceptions thrown should be printed.
    This class has been written by Yan Wittmann.
    Author:
    Yan Wittmann
